info.name: Casper Extension Table 120/180X75cm
info.LongDescription:
OVERVIEW
Slip and slide, it’s as easy as that. The Casper dining table cleverly extends from a two to four seat dining table to accommodate a dinner party of six. The mechanised extension system consists of a leaf hidden under the tabletop. It rests safely on fabric ledges, ready to slide into position. This integrated design feature makes the table’s compact size perfectly suited to a small space or apartment living but allows the flexibility to seat extra guests. 
The Casper looks smart, too. A low sheen, white painted tabletop sits on a durable metal frame, which is powder coated a matching white with a high-gloss finish for contrast. The feel is modern, clean and simple, and brings the brightness of white to the dining room.
 
“The Casper is excellent value: a stylish and compact dining table which has the option of being extended,” Freedom furniture buyer.
